mapper.select: /*privtMem.selectMember*/ SELECT A.USER_EMAIL , A.USER_NM_KH , A.USER_NM_EN , FN_GET_USER_NM_BY_USER_SEQ(A.USER_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS USER_NM , A.USER_SEQ , A.GENDER_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('GENDER_CD', A.GENDER_CD, #{langCd}) AS GENDER_NM , A.USER_CELL , A.BIRTH , DATE_FORMAT(A.BIRTH,'%d') AS BIRTH_DAY , DATE_FORMAT(A.BIRTH,'%m') AS BIRTH_MONTH , DATE_FORMAT(A.BIRTH,'%Y') AS BIRTH_YEAR , A.NID , A.ADDR_CD , A.ADDR_DTL , A.ADDR_FULL_CD , A.ADDR_FULL_NM , A.USER_AUTH_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('USER_AUTH_CD', A.USER_AUTH_CD, #{langCd}) AS USER_AUTH_NM , A.FILE_GRP_SEQ FROM CPES_USER A WHERE A.USER_SEQ = #{condUserSeq}

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_RESUME A INNER JOIN CPES_APPLIC B ON B.RESUME_SEQ = A.RESUME_SEQ AND (B.DEL_YN IS NULL OR B.DEL_YN != 'Y') INNER JOIN CPES_VACANCY C ON C.VACANCY_SEQ = B.VACANCY_SEQ AND C.VACANCY_STS_CD = 'VCS0000000001' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN CPES_COMPNY D ON D.COMPNY_SEQ = C.COMPNY_SEQ AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE A.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ) AS CNT_1 , ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_RESUME A INNER JOIN CPES_RESUME_OPEN_COMPNY B ON B.RESUME_SEQ = A.RESUME_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_COMPNY C ON C.COMPNY_SEQ = B.COMPNY_SEQ AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE A.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ) AS CNT_2 , ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_RESUME A INNER JOIN CPES_OFFER B ON B.RESUME_SEQ = A.RESUME_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_VACANCY C ON C.VACANCY_SEQ = B.VACANCY_SEQ AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN CPES_COMPNY D ON D.COMPNY_SEQ = C.COMPNY_SEQ AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE A.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ) AS CNT_3 , ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_RESUME A INNER JOIN CPES_APPLIC B ON B.RESUME_SEQ = A.RESUME_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_VACANCY C ON C.VACANCY_SEQ = B.VACANCY_SEQ AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN CPES_COMPNY D ON D.COMPNY_SEQ = C.COMPNY_SEQ AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN CPES_INTVW E ON E.APPLIC_SEQ = B.APPLIC_SEQ WHERE A.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ) AS CNT_4 , ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_BKMK A INNER JOIN CPES_VACANCY C ON C.VACANCY_SEQ = A.TABLE_KEY_SEQ AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN CPES_COMPNY D ON D.COMPNY_SEQ = C.COMPNY_SEQ AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE A.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND A.CATE_CD = 'BCT0000000003' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS CNT_5
